dia.str: Who let you in? Are you friend or foe? Speak quickly!
I'm neither, but I can tell you I'm not with the rebels.
Telling me you are not with the rebels means you probably are with the rebels.

You see what's happening down here. Rich men come here and gamble. This is the only fun they can have that the rebels don't know about. Throw in a decent amount of money for them. You look like a fellow who can spare some. Then I will believe your story.
I have to think about this.
